response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration and evaluation, we are offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant value compared to its market worth of $15,000 and its perceived value to you at $8,000. We are confident that by accepting this offer, you will see a substantial return on investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
